item.description:
I've arranged to have a Top Rope Manager (221) course on Sunday July 10'th, 10am to learn how to setup ropes outdoors at such places as Quincy Quarries. This is a 6 hour course, Metrorock will provide the ropes and equipment. We'll learn how to setup all the different types of anchors and climb a variety of routes.  Ideally bring your harness and shoes, belay device, lots of water, lunch, helmet, snacks, sun screen, bug spray.

If you need a climbing harness, belay device and shoe rentals please speak with Mike.

Here's the price breakdown I was offered:
$175 for one-on-one,
$150 per person for 2,
$125 per person for 3,
$100 per person for 4 or more people!

The first person to sign up will bring us to 3, and the second will bring us all down to $100.

You should know how to tie in and how to belay and know how to climb 5.6+ routes at least. We'll meet in the parking lot at 10am sharp. If you need transportation, Mike or I can help arrange.

Metrorock contact:
Mike Veazey
MetroRock Climbing School
978.499.7625

Rain will re-schedule, but weather is looking good! I hear we have an excellent instructor so it's time to get PUMPED!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in large parking lot, on right as you enter Ricciuti drive.
item.name: Top Rope Manager - Learn to setup top ropes and climb Quincy Quarries
